content: when namespace is same as some type name, then it can be called like a "method" in other language. Is there any mechanism to prevent multiple implementations with same function in different package?
one case is, when I import two packages from somewhere else, what if both of them define a function multiple times?
There is a name collision, and it is an error to even import the second file.
(There is an exception for theorems with identical statements.)
ok, I just came up with this question when I found I can do def List.fun1 ...
Shen Weihao has marked this topic as resolved.
